languages.text: Веабос-6 очищен от ксеносов, однако предводители рейда успели скрыться. Данные о разграблении Веабос-6 уже отправлены астропатическим сообщением на Даргонус. Ожидание ответа может занять некоторое время, проводить которое на отравленном мире-тюрьме нецелесообразно.

Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.
languages.original_text: Веабос-6 очищен от ксеносов, однако предводители рейда успели скрыться. Данные о разграблении Веабос-6 уже отправлены астропатическим сообщением на Даргонус. Ожидание ответа может занять некоторое время, проводить которое на отравленном мире-тюрьме нецелесообразно.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos-VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos-VI has already been sent by the astropathic choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

Vheabos-VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos-VI has already been sent by the astropathic choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

Vheabos-VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos-VI has already been sent by the astropathic choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

languages.text: 维博斯六号星上的异形已经被清理干净，但异形的首领却逃脱了。关于维博斯六号星遇袭的消息，已经由星语唱诗班发送给了达戈努斯。达戈努斯可能要过一段时间才会发来答复，行商浪人没必要继续留在这个刑罚世界浪费时间。
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

traits.locale_text: 维博斯六号星上的异形已经被清理干净，但异形的首领却逃脱了。关于维博斯六号星遇袭的消息，已经由星语唱诗班发送给了达戈努斯。达戈努斯可能要过一段时间才会发来答复，行商浪人没必要继续留在这个刑罚世界浪费时间。

languages.text: ヴィアボスVIから異種族は一掃されたが、襲撃の主導者らは逃げ切った。ヴィアボス・VIの略奪に関する情報は、感応通信聖歌隊によってすでにダルゴナスに送られたが、返答が来るまでにしばらく時間がかかるかもしれない。毒された流刑惑星でただ待って過ごすのは賢明ではない。
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

traits.locale_text: ヴィアボスVIから異種族は一掃されたが、襲撃の主導者らは逃げ切った。ヴィアボス・VIの略奪に関する情報は、感応通信聖歌隊によってすでにダルゴナスに送られたが、返答が来るまでにしばらく時間がかかるかもしれない。毒された流刑惑星でただ待って過ごすのは賢明ではない。

languages.text: Vheabos VI ha quedado purgado de xenos, pero los líderes de la incursión evitaron la captura. El Coro de Astrópatas ya ha enviado la información sobre el saqueo de Vheabos VI a Dargonus. La respuesta tardará un tiempo en llegar, y no es buena idea esperar a que llegue en el mundo penal tóxico.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos-VI ha quedado purgado de xenos, pero los líderes de la incursión evitaron la captura. El Coro de Astrópatas ya ha enviado la información sobre el saqueo de Vheabos-VI a Dargonus. La respuesta tardará un tiempo en llegar, y no es buena idea esperar a que llegue en el mundo penal tóxico.

languages.text: Vheabos VI wurde von den Xenos gesäubert, aber die Anführer der Raubzüge konnten sich der Gefangennahme entziehen. Informationen über die Plünderung von Vheabos-VI wurden vom astropathischen Chor bereits nach Dargonus übermittelt. Die Antwort wird etwas auf sich warten lassen und es wäre unklug, auf der vergifteten Strafwelt auf sie zu warten.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos-VI wurde von den Xenos gesäubert, aber die Anführer der Raubzüge konnten sich der Gefangennahme entziehen. Informationen über die Plünderung von Vheabos-VI wurden vom astropathischen Chor bereits nach Dargonus übermittelt. Die Antwort wird etwas auf sich warten lassen und es wäre unklug, auf der vergifteten Strafwelt auf sie zu warten.

languages.text: Vhéabos-VI a été purgé de la menace xénos, mais les responsables de l'attaque ont réussi à s'échapper. Des informations sur le pillage de Vhéabos-VI ont déjà été envoyées à Dargonus par le chœur astropathique. La réponse mettra du temps à arriver, mais il serait absurde de l'attendre sur ce monde pénal empoisonné.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

traits.locale_text: Vhéabos-VI a été purgé de la menace xénos, mais les responsables de l'attaque ont réussi à s'échapper. Des informations sur le pillage de Vhéabos-VI ont déjà été envoyées à Dargonus par le chœur astropathique. La réponse mettra du temps à arriver, mais il serait absurde de l'attendre sur ce monde pénal empoisonné.

languages.text: Vheabos VI, zenolardan arındırıldı. Baskını gerçekleştiren liderlerse kaçmayı başardı. Vheabos VI'daki yağma faaliyetlerine dair bilgiler, Astropatik Koro tarafından Dargonus'a yollandı. Yanıt gelmesi biraz zaman alabilir. Zehirlenmiş ceza dünyasında beklemek mantıklı olmaz.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI has been purged of xenos, but the raid leaders evaded capture. Information about the pillaging of Vheabos VI has already been sent by the Astropathic Choir to Dargonus. A response may take some time to arrive, and it would be unwise to spend it waiting on the poisoned penal world.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos VI, zenolardan arındırıldı ancak baskını gerçekleştiren liderler yakalanmaktan kurtuldu. Vheabos VI'daki yağma hakkındaki bilgiler Astropatik Koro tarafından Dargonus'a yollandı. Yanıt gelmesi biraz zaman alabilir ve zehirli ceza dünyasında beklemek mantıklı olmaz.
